tag.name: quality difference adjustment
tag.comment: dataset representing downstream changes due to quality differences in products on the same market

tag.name: household activity
tag.comment: dataset representing an activity taking place in private households

tag.name: complementary product
tag.comment: product needed for the proper functioning of a main product, but not part of this product, e.g. packaging or maintenance

tag.name: goods transport
tag.comment: dataset representing a goods transport activity

tag.name: consumption adjustment
tag.comment: dataset representing a change in consumption as a result of market constraints

tag.name: with true value
tag.comment: activities for which true value properties are defined (reserved; added by database)

tag.name: single enterprise data
tag.comment: dataset representing one single, anonymous enterprise

tag.name: branded dataset with logo
tag.comment: dataset for a named brand or from a named enterprise, with logo

tag.name: branded dataset without logo
tag.comment: dataset for a named brand or from a named enterprise, without logo
